attributes.action: Bring in first aid training in to all schools.
attributes.additional_details: This could save a lot more lives, Younger generation should be trained in schools so they can act on it straight away
attributes.background: Every school should learn about first aid training as this is one of the main things in life that is needed on a daily basis

rejection.details:
First aid training is already part of the health curriculum for schools, which you can see on page 37 + 38 of the curriculum guidance here:

https://assets.publishing.service.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/1090195/Relationships_Education_RSE_and_Health_Education.pdf
